simplifiedChinese.title: Living as God's Family
simplifiedChinese.Question1: Does this portion of Scripture address a character quality you should seek to cultivate? What is it?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: What actions can you embark on in your life to do this?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: Does this portion of Scripture address a character flaw you should seek to uproot? What is it?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: What actions can you embark on your life to do this?
